channel.title: Computer Vision on My Favorite
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on My Favorite

item.title: mAP (mean Average Precision) for Object Detection
item.description: AP (Average precision) is a popular metric in measuring the accuracy of object detectors like Faster R-CNN, SSD, etc. Average precision computes the average precision value for recall value over 0 to 1.

item.title: Analyzing Handwritten Digit Model with Tensorflow Line by Line
item.description: Let’s do a line-by-line analysis of this deep learning model and truly understand what’s going on. This model identifies handwritten digits. It’s one of the classic examples of machine learning applied to computer vision
